description: This file is the main entry point for a React web application, setting up the root rendering of the App component inside a DOM element with id 'root'. It imports React, ReactDOM, a global CSS file, and the main App component, then uses ReactDOM to render the application structure within a strict mode context.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM node.
